name: Sexy Chibi Maruko Chan
description:
The cute Chibi Maruko Chan will not forever be a child, just like all the children on this earth. We don't know what the future will be like. But we can try our best to be better human beings.

That's why I always admire parents who decide to have children, followed by an awareness of their responsibility to prepare for the future of their children by sacrifice their time and money, also always learning and practicing parenting every day. Let the children grow up as well as they want with responsibility.

In this work, I imagine Maruko growing up to be a cute and beautiful girl.

*This visual was inspired by the fictional Japanese character I watched every week as a child, Chibi Maruko Chan.
